attributes.action: introduce incentives to encourage greater use of roads by hauliers and commercials etc. between 22:00 & 07:00
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Driving the countries roads in the small hours gives a clear indication of where the future increase in road capacity should come from without any costly road building. These virtually empty roads not only offer speedy and efficient congestion free routes, but would also provide users huge savings in fuel and manpower costs. 
Increasing traffic using the roads during these hours would also serve to decrease congestion at peak and rush hour periods. Possibly using satelite technology to log off-peak journeys the data from which used to decrease any particular vehicle's liability to excise duty, this being offset with a reduced road building requirement.
